title: Тайны будущего
overview: Presenter Dmitry Savkin will talk about the problems of humanity, which threaten to be reborn into the apocalypse. They are always with us, and we do not attach much importance to them. What can we do against them and why can any apocalypse be prevented?Each episode of the project is dedicated to a specific issue. Predictions and prophecies, eternal youth, yeti and other mythical creatures, mold, food of the future, cyborgs, archaeological finds, mushrooms, aliens — these are just some of the topics that will be covered in the "Secrets of the Future".
